review_data.title: Very tasty food and charming service
review_data.content: To have a nice quiet lunch-meeting with one of my grandsons I reserved a comfortable and quiet table. We enjoyed the larger menu, consisting of soup, Sweet & Sour Shrimps, Szechuan Beef and a vegetable dish with fried rice followed by Lychee or freshly self...More

review_data.title: Authentisches chinesisches Restaurant
review_data.content: Freundlicher persönlicher Service, sehr gutes Essen, friedliches familiäres Ambiente. Das Preisleistungsverhältnis stimmt! :-)

review_data.title: Chinese Food
review_data.content: Very Good Food and service. A warm and pleasant welcome with lovely hosts. Will definitely visit again when in Zurich.

review_data.title: So so
review_data.content: The food is okay, so so. It could be the currency but I think the price is not cheap. Around CHF 35 for a small plate dish.

review_data.title: Lunch
review_data.content: Great food, everything is homemade and very fresh, amazing staff, family atmosphere, felt very welcome

review_data.title: Amazing authentic Chinese food conveniently located
review_data.content: Amazing authentic Chinese food, probably the best in Zurich city. Conveniently located 2 mins from tram stop and 10 mins walking from main station. Reasonably priced with a wide variety. Highly recommended.

review_data.title: Leckeres chinesisches Restaurant
review_data.content: Essen: lecker, sehr frisch (v.a. das Gemüse). Gosse Portionen. Nicht gerade billig, aber im Verhältnis zur Leistung ok. Ambiente: sehr...More

review_data.title: Nice Chinese Food, but quite tiny space..
review_data.content: Bamboo in service nice and good taste Chinese good.. Nice soup.. But looks quite small space restaurant divided into different compartment.. Toilet located at upstair.. Been frequent by a few hong kong celebraties..

review_data.title: Быстро и вкусно!
review_data.content: Ресторанчик китайской кухни с большим выбором всякой всячины. Можно выбрать под свой вкус поострее или наоборот.

review_data.title: Отличная китайская кухня
